Requires a USB wall power adapter for constant power. Enable Live video mode: 1. Turn GoPro camera on 2. Swipe down and select “Preferences” 3. Scroll down and select “Input/Output” 4. Select “HDMI Output” and change to “Live”

Disable stabilization to reduce video delay. Requires a USB wall power adapter. Enable Live video mode: 1. Turn GoPro camera on 2. Swipe down and select “Preferences” 3. Scroll down and select “Input/Output” 4. Select “HDMI Output” and change to “Live”

Requires Media Mod for HDMI output and a USB wall power adapter for constant power. Enable Live video mode: 1. Turn GoPro camera on 2. Swipe down and select “Preferences” 3. Scroll down and select “Input/Output” 4. Select “HDMI Output” and change to “Live”

Requires Media Mod for HDMI output. Live video and clean HDMI: 1. Connect HDMI cable and press "Mode". 2. In "Media", scroll right and select the "Live View". 3. In Live View, press the "mode" again and scroll right to the "Eye" to enable a clean display.
